txt.en: You have encountered a creature of ill omen unlike any of the lieutenants of the Enemy you have previously faced. What does its presence portend for the peoples of Middle-earth?
Talk to a Nedda Pinleaf in Bree, Ost Galadh, or the Twenty-first Hall

It is a time of ill omen. Harbingers of the Dead have crept forth from the shadows to threaten the peoples of Middle-earth, but what evil has drawn them forth?\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends.</rgb>

Nedda Pinleaf can be found the Skirmish camps of Bree, Ost Galadh, and Twenty-first Hall.\n\nHarbingers of the Dead have appeared in Skirmishes throughout Middle-earth. You should seek out Nedda Pinleaf to learn more about these mysterious foes.

'Yes? What do you want?'

You explain that you encountered a creature of ill omen in a recent skirmish.

'Do not speak so loudly of them!'

Nedda Pinleaf looks around and then her voice shrinks to a whisper.

'At first, I thought them only a mad hobbit's tale of overgrown Barrow-creatures, but I have since faced enough of them in battle to know better! I don't know where they've come from, but wherever they go, the Dead follow. I have heard tales of these harbingers of the Dead across many lands, and I have travelled far to find them. It seems they are drawn to sites of great battle... to lands where many skirmishes have been fought.

'Your reputation is known to me, [placeholder], as are your deeds. I say we work together to send these harbingers of the Dead back to wherever they came from!'
